txt.en: 'Deeds! Get your Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel here!\n\n'Talk to me one more time, and they're all yours!'
Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel Tier 2 through 4 Completion!
Speak to Chiver Me Timbers to continue
By completing this quest, you will automatically complete the Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel, tiers 2 through 4 instance deeds.
